section.name: Create Namespace
section.span: How to create a namespace to gather documenttypes in.

div.p: Creation of namespace with short name `sar', the name of the organization's online newspaper. A long name is associated with it, that is supposed to be unique in the whole world. This long name has the form of an URL.

section.p: While in the documenttypes tab, click on the selection menu at the top of the middle-right lane and select `create namespace' by clicking on it. A dialog window appears.
Type a name for the namespace, which may be short, as it will be used to add as a prefix to all names later defined in the namespace, to make them unique.

The name for the namespace will probably not be unique in the whole world. Associate a long, unique name with it, that has the form of a URL. The URL does not have to exist, but if your organization owns a website, it is good practice to use an URL you own, as that garanties it's uniqueness.
